#summary chassis home page

----
= About Chassis =

Chassis is a framework supporting data-sharing networks for large-scale research consortia.

----
= Chassis Manta =

The main product currently under development is a data submission and curation system for the WWARN project, codename *Chassis Manta*.

For more information on the project status, see ChassisManta.
